noun.description: A thing that increases the amount, level, or strength of something.
examples: the visit had been a morale raiser for his crew

noun.description: A person who breeds or grows animals or plants.
examples: my parents are simple cattle raisers

noun.description: Something which lifts or moves an object to a higher position or level.
(in poker or brag) a person who bets a specified amount more than another player.
examples: the original raiser hesitated and checked
